text_block_list.text: The day of the classic Triple Crown race, the 'Satsuki Sho'. In the spectator seats, many visitors were getting excited for the fierce battle about to begin!
Meanwhile, in the underground passageway, Mihono Bourbon, fully pumped up. Rice Shower, who admires Mihono Bourbon and feels driven to catch up.
And watching those two from the side is Matikanetannhauser.
Feeling a slight sense of unease at the sight of them being in the wings as if it were natural... the 'Satsuki Sho' began!
